name: Recharge: Mindful Moves XR
summary:
Is This App for You?

• Are you suffering from stress?
We understand how overwhelming stress can be. Most of our users feel completely recharged after just 5 minutes.

• Do overtrained muscles leave you feeling sore and exhausted?
Our balanced body-mind exercises promote faster recovery and lasting results.

• Are you starting to feel the effects of aging?
We know what it's like as you pass 40. Mindful Moves helps your body feel younger and revitalized.
